study_tag.description: Linking associations with study. Must match the study tag in the study table

haplotype_id.description: For haplotype associations identifies identifies rows belonging together

pvalue.description: Reported p-value for variant in scientific notation

pvalue_text.description: Free text to add extra information eg. conditional analysis

proxy_variant.description: rsID of a proxy SNP used in the replication stage only

effect_allele.description: The allele whose effects are being studied in relation to the phenotype

other_allele.description: The other allele at the locus

effect_allele_frequency.description: frequency of the effect allele or haplotype in the control population

odds_ratio.description: Effect size of the effect allele or haplotype from a logistic regression for binary traits

beta.description: Effect size from a linear regression for continious traits

ci_lower.description: Lower limit of the confidence interval

ci_upper.description: Upper limit of the confidence interval
